Class RoomModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractModel
      • PerfectModel
        • RoomModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WrappingModel

    public class RoomModel
extends PerfectModel
    RoomMaze Class inherit from PerfectMaze and override buildMaze() in super class by adding additional connections based on the necessary connections which are created in PerfectMaze.

    • Method Detail

      • buildMaze

        public boolean buildMaze()
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Build the cells, walls of the maze and set the golds and thieves. Use Union-Find to remove walls/add connections which guarantee that the player can reach any of the cell.
        Specified by:
        buildMaze in interface IModel
        Overrides:
        buildMaze in class PerfectModel
        Returns:
        true: build successfully; false: build unsuccessfully

      • buildRoomMaze

        protected boolean buildRoomMaze(int seed1,
                                int seed2)
        Helper function of buildMaze().
        Parameters:
        seed1 - random seed for build perfect maze
        seed2 - random seed for creating additional connections between random adjacent cells.
        Returns:
